data.title: Wearing black jackets adorned with a symbol of a Viking and the Finnish flag, the "Soldiers of Odin" have surfaced as self-proclaimed patriots patrolling the streets to protect native Finns from immigrants, worrying the government and police.
N. Korea says its H-bomb ‘capable of wiping out whole US at once’

French Jews asked to hide their identity 'until better days'. The head of Marseille's Israelite Consistory, is urging Jewish men to forego wearing skullcaps (kippot) after a particularly vicious anti-Semitic attack on a school teacher, saying the measure was needed to protect Jewish lives.
Migrant crisis: Coach full of British schoolchildren 'attacked by Calais refugees'

Saudi Arabia arrests human rights activist Samar Badawi who was the first woman to sue her guardian for preventing her from marrying the man of her choice, and also sued the Saudi government for the right to vote in municipal elections
Calais Jungle: 2,000 refugees 'given three days to leave as bulldozers move in'
Teen jihadi 'proud' of attack on Jewish man in Marseille | 15-year-old Islamic State supporter ‘ashamed’ he failed to kill teacher Benjamin Amsellem with a machete
Scientists say humans have canceled the next ice age
French Jewish politician found dead with stab wounds in his apartment
